verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by Jordan <WH3383> near Jericho <WH3405>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they give <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> of the inheritance <WH5159> of their possession <WH272> cities <WH5892> to dwell in <WH3427>; and ye shall give <WH5414> also unto the Levites <WH3881> suburbs <WH4054> for the cities <WH5892> round about <WH5439> them.
And the cities <WH5892> shall they have to dwell in <WH3427>; and the suburbs <WH4054> of them shall be for their cattle <WH929>, and for their goods <WH7399>, and for all their beasts <WH2416>.

And the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities <WH5892>, which ye shall give <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881>, shall reach from the wall <WH7023> of the city <WH5892> and outward <WH2351> a thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520> round about <WH5439>.

And ye shall measure <WH4058> from without <WH2351> the city <WH5892> on the east <WH6924> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>, and on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> two thousand <WH505> cubits <WH520>; and the city <WH5892> shall be in the midst <WH8432>: this shall be to them the suburbs <WH4054> of the cities <WH5892>.

And among the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> there shall be six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> for refuge <WH4733>, which ye shall appoint <WH5414> for the manslayer <WH7523>, that he may flee <WH5127> thither: and to them ye shall add <WH5414> forty <WH705> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892>. to them: Heb. above them ye shall give
So all the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> shall be forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities <WH5892>: them shall ye give with their suburbs <WH4054>.

And the cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> shall be of the possession <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: from them that have many <WH7227> ye shall give many <WH7235>; but from them that have few <WH4592> ye shall give few <WH4591>: every one <WH376> shall give <WH5414> of his cities <WH5892> unto the Levites <WH3881> according <WH6310> to his inheritance <WH5159> which he inheriteth <WH5157>. he: Heb. they inherit
And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them, When ye be come over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>;

Then ye shall appoint <WH7136> you cities <WH5892> to be cities <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for you; that the slayer <WH7523> may flee <WH5127> thither, which killeth <WH5221> any person <WH5315> at unawares <WH7684>. at: Heb. by error

And they shall be unto you cities <WH5892> for refuge <WH4733> from the avenger <WH1350>; that the manslayer <WH7523> die <WH4191> not, until he stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> in judgment <WH4941>.
And of these cities <WH5892> which ye shall give <WH5414> six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall ye have for refuge <WH4733>.

Ye shall give <WH5414> three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, and three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> shall ye give <WH5414> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, which shall be cities <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733>.

These six <WH8337> cities <WH5892> shall be a refuge <WH4733>, both for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and for the stranger <WH1616>, and for the sojourner <WH8453> among <WH8432> them: that every one that killeth <WH5221> any person <WH5315> unawares <WH7684> may flee <WH5127> thither.
And if he smite <WH5221> him with an instrument <WH3627> of iron <WH1270>, so that he die <WH4191>, he is a murderer <WH7523>: the murderer <WH7523> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>.

And if he smite <WH5221> him with throwing <WH3027> a stone <WH68>, wherewith he may die <WH4191>, and he die <WH4191>, he is a murderer <WH7523>: the murderer <WH7523> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>. with: Heb. with a stone of the hand

Or if he smite <WH5221> him with an hand <WH3027> weapon <WH3627> of wood <WH6086>, wherewith he may die <WH4191>, and he die <WH4191>, he is a murderer <WH7523>: the murderer <WH7523> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>.
The revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> himself shall slay <WH4191> the murderer <WH7523>: when he meeteth <WH6293> him, he <WH1931> shall slay <WH4191> him.
But if he thrust <WH1920> him of hatred <WH8135>, or hurl <WH7993> at him by laying of wait <WH6660>, that he die <WH4191>;

Or in enmity <WH342> smite <WH5221> him with his hand <WH3027>, that he die <WH4191>: he that smote <WH5221> him shall surely <WH4191> be put to death <WH4191>; for he is a murderer <WH7523>: the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> shall slay <WH4191> the murderer <WH7523>, when he meeteth <WH6293> him.
But if he thrust <WH1920> him suddenly <WH6621> without <WH3808> enmity <WH342>, or have cast <WH7993> upon him any thing <WH3627> without laying of wait <WH6660>,

Or with any stone <WH68>, wherewith a man may die <WH4191>, seeing <WH7200> him not <WH3808>, and cast <WH5307> it upon him, that he die <WH4191>, and was not his enemy <WH341>, neither sought <WH1245> his harm <WH7451>:
Then the congregation <WH5712> shall judge <WH8199> between the slayer <WH5221> and the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> according to these judgments <WH4941>:

And the congregation <WH5712> shall deliver <WH5337> the slayer <WH7523> out of the hand <WH3027> of the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818>, and the congregation <WH5712> shall restore <WH7725> him to the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, whither he was fled <WH5127>: and he shall abide <WH3427> in it unto the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, which was anointed <WH4886> with the holy <WH6944> oil <WH8081>.
But if the slayer <WH7523> shall at any time <WH3318> come <WH3318> without the border <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, whither he was fled <WH5127>;

And the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> find <WH4672> him without <WH2351> the borders <WH1366> of the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, and the revenger <WH1350> of blood <WH1818> kill <WH7523> the slayer <WH7523>; he shall not be guilty of blood <WH1818>: he: Heb. no blood shall be to him

Because he should have remained <WH3427> in the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733> until the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>: but after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548> the slayer <WH7523> shall return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of his possession <WH272>.
So these things shall be for a statute <WH2708> of judgment <WH4941> unto you throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings <WH4186>.

Whoso killeth <WH5221> any person <WH5315>, the murderer <WH7523> shall be put to death <WH7523> by the mouth <WH6310> of witnesses <WH5707>: but one <WH259> witness <WH5707> shall not testify <WH6030> against any person <WH5315> to cause him to die <WH4191>.

Moreover ye shall take <WH3947> no satisfaction <WH3724> for the life <WH5315> of a murderer <WH7523>, which is guilty <WH7563> of death <WH4191>: but he shall be surely <WH4191> put to death <WH4191>. guilty: Heb. faulty to die

And ye shall take <WH3947> no satisfaction <WH3724> for him that is fled <WH5127> to the city <WH5892> of his refuge <WH4733>, that he should come again <WH7725> to dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776>, until the death <WH4194> of the priest <WH3548>.

So ye shall not pollute <WH2610> the land <WH776> wherein ye are: for blood <WH1818> it defileth <WH2610> the land <WH776>: and the land <WH776> cannot be cleansed <WH3722> of the blood <WH1818> that is shed <WH8210> therein, but by the blood <WH1818> of him that shed <WH8210> it. the land cannot: Heb. there can be no expiation for the land

Defile <WH2930> not therefore the land <WH776> which ye shall inhabit <WH3427>, wherein <WH8432> I dwell <WH7931>: for I the LORD <WH3068> dwell <WH7931> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
